title: Employment Agreement

obligations.description: serve as Senior Software Engineer, developing enterprise-level applications, mentoring junior developers, and making architectural decisions
provide compensation, benefits, and support as outlined in the agreement

special_terms: At-will employment; either party may terminate with 30 days written notice
3 months base salary severance upon termination without cause
12 months non-compete period within 100-mile radius of headquarters
termination_conditions: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice
Termination for cause includes breach of confidentiality, gross negligence, or policy violation
